main.subheader: Our business is based on the real problems of students, so if you have an idea how we could improve your school life, please contact us as soon as possible!

people.tw: Feedback from our recipients and users is the most important, so feel free to write what you think!
people.jf: I am one of the developers building the application. If you have questions, problems or any ideas - feel free to write
people.jj: Whats up! If you have any problem, write to me!
people.dn: Marketing, Business, School? Or maybe something else? If you have any questions or doubts, feel free to write!
people.wl: Who asks not stray! If you have any questions, feel free to write to me!

modal.header: WE ARE WAITING FOR FEEDBACK FROM YOU!
modal.subheader: We are happy to answer your questions, suggestions or comments!
